attributes.action: KEEP INDEFINITE LEAVE TO REMAIN FOR 5 YEARS FOR THE EXISTING CARE WORKERS
attributes.additional_details: Moreover, it’s also gonna have devastating  Impact on our dependents and children who Live  with us and  contribute in this country day and night by working  hard in different sectors and paying taxes   with no criminal record  with  Speaking Good level of english and Considered as law abiding immigrants please we humbly Requesting & Hoping that This 15 years policy will Not apply on existing care workers  who are already on the path to get ILR in 5 years in uk .
attributes.background: Dear government, we the existing care or senior  care workers  will be treating So unfair if current 5 years settlement route will move from 5 to 15 years for us because it’s not only gonna impact on us but for those vulnerable people as well for whom we care for Everyday to promote their wellbeing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action: 

"Keep 5-year ILR for Health and Care visa holders to protect the NHS" 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745684

"Maintain the current 5-year route to (ILR) for Senior Carers & Care Assistants"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/752023
